author: hwright
msg: (svn_client_copy_into, svn_client_move_into):  Add a doc note regarding

author: hwright
msg: Improve atomicity in the case of wc->wc moves and copies.  Instead of performing
existence checks on each item as we go, perform them all up front.  In this way,
we catch errors before we start performing any of the moves or copies,
ensuring success when we actually do the action.
(wc_to_wc_copy_single): Don't check for existence for each copy pair.  Also,
take a copy_pair as a arg, instead of a src and a dst.
(wc_to_wc_copy): Check for existence here, and error if any of the checks

author: malcolm
msg: Fix issue 2648: Include more information in hook script failure messages to
Also refactor to make the error handling paths easier to follow.
(check_hook_result): New.  Helper function factored out from part of
run_hook_cmd(), altered to return a more descriptive error message.

author: hwright
msg: Add and remove newlines to make the code more readable.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r22457: cleanup and add extra comment.
(svn_path_is_root): add comment explaining the need for this custom
implementation. Fix some whitespaces to match our coding guidelines.
